column5: it would be interesting to see if the ontario tourism industry is supporting this!!!!!
I think everyone is overreacting to this. There is no way fishing will be banned. This whole thing has been taken out of context.

toronto angler I really hope you are right BUT!!!! and to all the guys who think I just catch and release , your the ones they hate the most,go figure when a friend showed me this I was floored what are this people using for brains....  http://www.P3TA.org/sea_kittens/ ya got to change the 3 to an e to get it too work , Sea kittens now I have heard everything DUHHHHHHHH!!!!
WWF and not the wrestling group is involved in this, you know the same people that worked on getting the ban on the spring bear hunt. So don't think for a second that they do not have power.  Ken

Does anyone have a more credible source? It's just that there is a tremendous amount of bias of this being a conservative website and referring to the US government as the Obama White House.  Also I seriously don't see them closing down a multi billion dollar industry, especially in this economy.
WOW,...thats scary stuff!!!  Imagine 60,000,000 americans invading canadian fisheries?  Yikes,..think it gets crowded now?
I took this from the other post here regarding this issue. You may want to read it before you go selling your fishing gear.  http://www.examiner.com/x-37128-Charlotte-...-to-ban-fishing
